entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
